name: The Scrimshander’s Widow; or, Her Fine Strong Arms
name_original: The Scrimshander’s Widow; or, Her Fine Strong Arms
description:
An original piece of interactive fiction written in the form a traditional English Fairy tale. It's the story of a young widow who has ever more work to do than a single set of hands can accomplish. It was created and submitted for the game Pendragon and is presented here as part of #pendragonjam

A polished and expanded telling of it in a short story form can be found here and the option to buy me a coffee can be found here for anyone so inclined.
